description: This is a React front-end source file defining the main application component 'App'. It manages theme toggling (light/dark mode), sets up routing for.home and default routes, and renders a header with interactive elements including a theme toggle button, logo, and links.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional component managing theme state and rendering the application's routes and header.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle between light and dark themes, updating the theme state.
